A12c: You never know what new tool or advice will be the game-changer for your business. #smallbizchat
A12b: Companies like #Creditera can take some of the work off your plate and help you succeed. #smallbizchat
A12a: There’s more technology avail than ever b4 to help make things easier. explore what’s around you.   #smallbizchat
.@BlondeBaker1920 Ask your suppliers about discounts for paying early... if you haven't : ) #smallbizchat
.@MrMikeSmith Yes, the sooner you start building strong credit history and capacity, the better.  #smallbizchat
A11d: Regularly monitor ur reports. Business #creditscores can fall fast as new data comes in. #smallbizchat
A11c: I can’t say this enough—pay ALL your bills on time. 1 day late can hurt your biz credit scores.  #smallbizchat
A11b: Check for errors on reports—esp biz reports. Mistakes more common w/ biz credit bc it’s easy for data to get mixed up. #smallbizchat
A11a: 4 ways: 1. Be sure to sep ur biz fr ur pers credit, so that ur not hurting ur pers credit trying to fund ur biz ops. #smallbizchat
.@BlondeBaker1920 Thx for taking part!  #smallbizchat
A10d: #Tradecredit gives ur extra time to pay for supplies and services (net-7, -15, -30, or -60 days). Levels cash flow.  #smallbizchat
A10c: If ur in an industry that works w/ vendors or suppliers, u sh ask abt setting up trade credit accounts. #smallbizchat
A10b: 2. It may be stating the obvious, but should always pay these bills on time. #smallbizchat
A10a: 2 simple things you should do: 1. Open a business credit card that’s not associated with your personal credit. #smallbizchat
@marvhight Great to hear! We try to make it simple and intuitive to use our site. #smallbizchat
@MichellePippin Too true. Healthy biz credit can make life a lot easier.  #smallbizchat
@OrbitZenMedia For sure- SMBs have plenty to worry about, accessing capital shouldn't be one of them.  #smallbizchat
A9c: Qualifying for better loan interest rates or terms can make the diff between thriving and having to close up shop.    #smallbizchat
A9b:  Margins are razor-thin for most small businesses, so every little bit (better rates, cost savings) helps. #smallbizchat
A9a: By making it simple for biz owners to build better credit and understand how to improve their financial health #smallbizchat
@OrbitZenMedia Yes, you've got to stay on top of it, but the payoff of strong biz credit is huge #smallbizchat
A8c: After signing up, you’ll see a dashboard that shows ur business and pers #creditscores in 1 spot. #smallbizchat
A8b: We don’t require a credit card, and it’s not some trial that expires in 30 days       #smallbizchat
A8a: Signing up for our site is free and biz owners can access their biz and personal data in seconds. #smallbizchat
. @marvhight Hv 5+ suppliers reporting to D&B. Use the accounts and make payments on time. That easy. #smallbizchat
A7c: This will make more biz owners financially stronger, so they can get funding, and build the biz they’ve dreamed abt. #smallbizchat
A7b: You don’t hv to be an expert to use our site—we’ve made it ez to understand and build credit. #smallbizchat
A7a: Trying to figure out business credit and financing shouldn’t be another burden—it is too important to ignore. #smallbizchat
. @BlondeBaker1920 Credibility & trust crucial for customers. BBB is one of many sources. Not a factor for credit scores tho. #smallbizchat
A6c: There's a serious disconnect, so I wanted to simplify the process for small biz owners. #smallbizchat
.@marvhight For personal yes. But not for business reports.  #smallbizchat
A6b: By trial and error, I figured out what worked--but it was miserable #smallbizchat
A6a: My first 4 businesses were all Main Street. I had to deal w/ pers and business credit all the time. #smallbizchat
A5c: On our site, we give access to Experian and D&B’s biz repts and scores, along w/ pers reports fr TransUnion and Experian #smallbizchat
A5b: Each creates their own repts and scores—and depending on what data they have on file—their scores can vary DRAMATICALLY #smallbizchat
A5a: There are 3 main credit reporting bureaus: #Experian, #Equifax and #Dun&Bradstreet #smallbizchat
A4c: For financing, taking care of your credit should be the 1st step in the process.  #smallbizchat
A4b: Ur biz suppliers, vendors, cust and insurance can look at ur #businesscredit when deciding to work w/ u and setting terms #smallbizchat
A4a: First, it’s imp to know that biz credit impacts much more than just getting financing and loans #smallbizchat
@OrbitZenMedia Yes, separating personal from biz finances/credit should be priority. Impossible to scale biz on personal alone #smallbizchat
.@BlondeBaker1920 Be sure to build your biz credit along with your personal. Biz lenders can look at both. #smallbizchat
A3d: A business with strong credit can access 10 to 100 times more capital than a consumer. #smallbizchat
A3c: The very 1st thing u should do is open biz credit cards that report to the biz bureaus. #smallbizchat
A3b: This can kill your personal #creditscores. #smallbizchat
A3a: One of the BIGGEST mistakes new biz owners make is just using personal credit cards and funds when starting out. #smallbizchat
A2c:  Plus, most media coverage only talks about #consumercredit—which is great—everyone knows how imp personal credit is now. #smallbizchat
A2b: Bankers may deny someone a loan, but not really be able to explain how they’re judging the business. #smallbizchat
A2a: Until recently, it’s been hard to get ur hands on ur #businesscredit information. #smallbizchat
@BlondeBaker1920 Great to hear! You've got to stay on top of it, but it's worth it. #smallbizchat
A1c: Lenders, vendors, potential cust and insurance co use ur biz scores and reports to judge ur biz. #smallbizchat
A1b: A recent survey by the Federal Bank of New York showed that 72% of biz owners who apply for a loan get denied.    #smallbizchat
A1a: #Businesscredit is a blind spot for many #entrepreneurs. #smallbizchat
